mapper.select: select count(case when age<19 then 1 end) "lowerTwenty" ,count(case when age between 20 and 29 then 1 end) "twenty" ,count(case when age between 30 and 39 then 1 end) "thirdy" ,count(case when age between 40 and 49 then 1 end) "fourty" ,count(case when age between 50 and 59 then 1 end) "fifty" ,count(case when age between 60 and 69 then 1 end) "sixty" ,count(case when age >=70 then 1 end) "seventy" from ( select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-concat(case when substr(client_rrn,8,1) in ('1','2') then '19' else '20' end,substr(client_rrn,1,2)) as age from client )
select count(case when substr(client_rrn,8,1) in ('1','3') then 1 end) "man" ,count(case when substr(client_rrn,8,1) in ('2','4') then 1 end) "woman" from client
select NVL(count(*),0) today from client where to_char(client_date,'yyyymmdd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
